title.rendered: Pittsburgh Magazine features Nantucket Stacked Stone Veneer in Ultimate House

content.rendered: Written for residents in or near Pennsylvania to gain an insider’s look into the regions’ lifestyles, Pittsburgh Magazine features Eldorado Stone’s Nantucket Stacked Stone Veneer in the November 2015 issue. In the Pittsburgh Magazine’s Ultimate House, the architectural stone veneer can be seen on three different pages on the outdoor façade of the home and in the outdoor kitchen area. The feature can be found on pages 167, 212 and 218.
